name: Select Holding
legal: società di diritto di Hong Kong
goal: •	Select Holding Ltd. is a company operating in the tourism sector that has signed on April 5, 2013 an agreement, on an exclusive basis with the China Tourism Academy (public body of the Ministry of Tourism China), China Central Television(CCTV) and the UNION PAY, for the launching of a project designed to support the promotion and marketing in China for the Italian Hospitality Industry through the definition of a Government Standard of Services - Welcome Chinese Hospitality Certification – will strive to facilitate business between China and Italy through cooperation with different facilities; Airports, Museums, Shopping Malls and Theme Parks to name a few, who chooses to  participate, must comply with specific standards to be adopted.
euInitiatives:
- Eu-China Tourism Year
- European Parliament Tourism Initiative
- Visas Chine
